A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi is a boring\, cliche mess of a movie. The first half of this movie (Up until Finn and Rose get picked up by the bandit) Is a great example of Disney's Ignorance of making a good movie. I wanted to got to sleep during the first half. Also\, Rose is worse than Jar Jar. The Second Half improves but still has cliche and boring elements.
